title: 84/152/EEC: Commission Decision of 5 March 1984 approving a programme for the processing and marketing of feed grains in some regions in Italy, pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 5 March 1984
approving a programme for the processing and marketing of feed grains in some regions in Italy, pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(84/152/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. The programmes for the processing and marketing of feed grains in the Regions of Tuscany, Marche, Umbria and Sardinia, pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 355/77, submitted by the Italian Government on 1 September 1983 are hereby approved.
2. Approval of the programmes relates only to projects submitted before 30 April 1984.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 March 1984.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 332, 27. 11. 1982, p. 1.
